## toggle variable

If `square` is true, the clickable area will not fill the entire cell, but only a left-aligned square of cell/row height.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toggle: (gui: IMGUI, layout: LayoutBox | IGridLayout, id: string, val: boolean, square?: boolean | undefined, label?: string | undefined, info?: string | undefined) => boolean | undefined
```
